name: emailverification
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool fast_email_verifier.
Tool description: APISOLUTION services provide a comprehensive API for fast email validation and verification for any developer to use on start-ups and staff projects.
API description: Basic usage
It is a simple way to verify an email address with different dimensions.

emailsimple.description: The email address to be verified. Defaults to 'mbavazijoshua@gmail.com'.
